phrases: Thanks for the meal, I am leaving now!
I was just wondering if you were here...
I did not actually have anything to tell you...
Why do I have to eat together with you?!
It is strange for a boy and a girl to eat together!
We have not start going out together yet...
What I am saying is, you should eat together with your friends!
Did you hear anything from your brother?
Why do not we go home together?
Why did you keep it a secret from me?
Not like I was actually hiding it...
Besides, I am not dancing because I like it.
Friends always exchange their side dishes with each other.
There were lots of people at the snack bar!
Err, Isurugi Noe-san, this is Kurobe Tomoyo.
We do not have club activities today.
Even though he told me he has practice...
It is going pretty well for him, I must say.
If it goes well, maybe the four of us could go out together next time.
Kind of like a group date...
Hey, is not that a new sweater?
Told you to leave it to me!
I know everything about Aiko, you see!
But... is not that one just a bit plain?
Does not seem like Ai-chan's taste...
You could have told me, I would have gone shopping with you.
Did not you buy that one over at that store?
What was that store that Ai-chan likes to go again?
Oh yeah, why do not you also buy yourself a sweater?
Since all you have been wearing is that one.
If I am to get another one, it would sure be nice if it was one that Ai-chan made...
Or, that is what I want to say.
I see things are getting pretty hot between you two!
Let us go to the seashore.
I bet Shinichirou-kun's colder than me.
What do you mean by that?
Besides, it is usually guys who do this.
It is the second time already...
Well, I am fine with it, anyways.
You do not have dance practice today?
Shinichirou-kun is the main lead, huh?
You know, if you would like, next time...
At lunch, Isurugi Noe came to the bleachers at the field.
Oh, you mean where you eat?
She told me Friends always exchange their side dishes with each other.
Did she give you any trouble?
Besides, it was me who asked Shinichirou-kun to introduce Isurugi Noe to me.
Well, do not you think she is a strange girl?
Well, she is not a bad person, though.
I did not say it clearly, but...
I would like the two of you to stop walking around together outside.
Maybe you do not understand this,
But to begin with... you already live under the same roof, a boy and a girl...
Yup, but I cannot eat with boys.
Do not you think that Hiromi's been pushing herself too hard recently?
How did you find out about this place?
It is fine if I eat with guys once in a while, right?
Oh, you cannot eat that one.
You will only lie more if you eat food that rips people off.
Shinichirou's a person who can she would precious tears.
But, how are you going to turn my tears into yours?
There is still quite a lot to do.
But, granny did it on me this way.
Is the moment when Raigou-maru wants to fly to the sky.
It is a breezy afternoon with a clear sky,
Because of the wind the day before, broken straws and grass are everywhere, scattered across the ground.
Even those worms, delicious and usually hard-to-find,
Is not this exactly how she imagines it?
I told you, did not I.
Now look here... do not go around trying to control how others feel.
It is not that big of a deal.
Then, in return for me dating Isurugi Noe,
You would also need to go out with Hiromi, how about that?
See, you need to think about it as well.
That is not what I meant,
Do not tell me you do not know!
Oh, you mean No. 6 on your team?
Dammit, just what is with that guy?
He could not possibly be serious, right?
Same for Hiromi, I do not see any good in that guy.
I do not get it at all!
Just what the hell does he think other's feelings are?
How could he possibly propose to date with someone else as a return of favor?
But it was me who proposed that as a return favor.
then would not it be perfect for Hiromi?
So this is how you truly imagine?
I have something to tell you.
Well... there is no rush... we could talk about it at school tomorrow.
It is the first time I have entered this room.
Is not this the first time?
It is the first time that you have entered my room, ever since I moved here, right?
Hey, what is with this conversation?
I just met No. 4 from Hotarugawa High.
He told me that he thinks you are cute.
I do not like nosy boys like you.
You know, I did not imagine you would reply th-
Is that the only reason you entered my room?
But did not you let me in?
I told you, it is fine if we talk about it tomorrow.
We will be in trouble if your mother finds out.
I have something to tell you.
Well... there is no rush... we could talk about it at school tomorrow.
Is not this the first time?
It is the first time that you have entered my room, ever since I moved here, right?
I just met No. 4 from Hotarugawa High.
He told me that you are cute.
I do not like nosy boys like you.
I do not like nosy boys like you.
You know, I did not imagine you would reply th-
Is that the only reason you entered my room?
But did not you let me in?
I told you, it is fine if we talk about it tomorrow.
Are you only in here to talk about that?!
We will be in trouble if your mother finds out.
He entered my room to say something like that...
Bocchan, it took me a long time to pack this up.
Old picture books from back when I was young truly are nostalgic.
I will help you out the next time you clean up the storage.
Is not that an old photo album?
Why is the face of the woman in this photo cut off?
Hey, let us meet up at Ai-chan's later.
I need to go home and finish up my stuff first.
Today, I am late for the opening time.
So even Ai-chan has a girl-like side!
I bet Miyokichi is really happy.
Shinichirou, is not your size about the same as his?
Since I am not confident enough.
Why do not you just get him to do it?
Is not it tough when you cannot tell your feelings to the one you like?
What... kind of joke is this?
